name: Zapodot's projects
body:
### Zapodot's projects
Some projects I am currently working on
* Play Metrics - A Play! Framework 2.0 plugin for gathering metrics using the wonderful Metrics library (created by @CodaHale)
* Play Constretto - A Play! Framework 2.1 plugin for enabling the Constretto configuration tool to be used in conjunction with the standard Play configuration mechanism
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
